name: Accelerate Coach
description: Accelerate coach is a European business and Google partner that coaches business growth and strategy to small and mid-level business.

name: SRC Miniboard
description: SRC Miniboard is a serverless solution for livestream entertainment on the Twitch platform that leverages two seperate API's to improve viewer retention.

name: Lezay Redesign
description: Lezay is an international business based in Germany that focuses on offering curated beauty products based on the customers individual's needs.

name: Lone Star National Bank
description: Lone Star National Bank is one of the largest regional banks in the Rio Grande Valley. The new site included multiple dynamic templates, static pages, and WCAG-AA compliance.

name: Flores Funeral Home
description: Flores is a local funeral home that has been servicing the good people of Pharr for over a hundred years. The funeral home wanted to bring their marketing to the modern standards for reaching customers and marketing.
